subtitle: part five the astral plane lesson 13
lower astral planes there are three
great planes of manifestation in the
cosmos the material plane of the astral
plane and the spiritual plane there is
much confusion in the use of the term
plane in the occult writings farad is
employed in various ways from necessity
and then the absence of other words with
which to express the unfamiliar facts of
the case for instance many occultists
very probably speak of the physical
plane of the mental plane and the
spiritual plane of thought meaning
respectively thereby that one the plane
of thought connected with the sensations
of the body the physical desires etc and
two of the plaintive intellect reason
etc and finally three the plane of the
higher mental activities and
manifestations familiarly known as the
spiritual plane of thought the beginner
in the study of occultism is apt to
confuse the above usage of the terms
with that employed in speaking or
writing of the three great planes of the
cosmos the material plane of the astral
plane and the spiritual plane the second
of which the astral plane will form the
subject of consideration in the present
lesson and the two immediately following
in its sequence the word plane has been
appropriated by occult writers from
necessity and given a meaning apparently
at variance with the accepted usage in
ordinary language a plane is a perfectly
flat level and smooth surface in
geometry and astronomy it is sometimes
used in an abstract or ideal sense to
indicate an ideal surface supposed to
cut or pass through a solid body or in
various directions as the plane of an
elliptical or the plane of a planet's
orbit etcetera it is also used in a
figurative sense implying a level or
field or on the plane of reason on the
plane of common sense etc generally
speaking it's figurative use implies a
later or layer or strata or level and it
is used in a cult phraseology in the
figurative sense of a level or strata of
cosmic activity or manifestation but the
student is cautioned against confusing
the term plane with any conception of
place a plane is not a place a
particular place may include several
planes and subply ins for the planes
inter
penetrate each other a plane has no
dimension of space and rather it more
resembles a state or condition it cannot
be measured in the three dimensions and
yet it is capable of measurement by
degrees in the scale of vibration these
states are degrees of vibration
interpenetrate each other without
interference in which peculiarly they
have correspondences or analogies in
physical phenomena for instance a dozen
or more currents of electricity may pass
along the same wire at the same time
without interfering with each other
and may then register each on its own
special instrument providing at the rate
of tension or vibration be different in
each case or again light vibrations heat
vibrations vibrations of electricity and
magnetism of several degrees vibrations
of the x-rays sound vibrations etc may
manifest and remain present in the space
of a room at the same time
the various planes of manifestation
blend into each other and each of the
three planes has seven sub planes which
in turn are subdivided into seven minor
planes and so on until seven times seven
acts of subdivision have been made on
the physical plane of the cosmos occurs
the various manifestations of the
physical world the world of matter and
energy it is the plane best known to us
for all of our physical activities are
performed on some of its sub planes on
these planes there are manifestations of
matter of degrees unrecognized by the
sense of man as well as the familiar
forms in degrees likewise there are
forces and energies of which man of
today is totally ignorant with the
exception of a few advanced souls who
have risen above the ordinary race
limitation it is not our purpose to
enter into a consideration of the
physical plane in this lesson
neither is it our purpose to enter in a
consideration of the spiritual plane the
conception of which is beyond the
comprehension of the ordinary human of
which the words of the ordinary plane of
life would be utterly inadequate to
express our subject for consideration
here is simply the second plan of the
cosmos of the astral plane
the term astral from the Greek word
meaning a star is an ancient usage in
the cult teaching astral regions and
astral beings were held to be places and
beings of a more ethereal and finer
ordering
than our material world and being so far
as the bodies of the latter were
concerned at least in the astral regions
that disembodied entities and the
supernatural beings were held to abide
the term was often used loosely in a
manner tending to confuse a student in
fact even today the term is used with
various shades of meaning by the
different schools of occultism and
confusion results by reason thereof some
schools use the term astral plane to
designate only the lor sub planes of the
astral using other terms to designate
the higher planes which latter they
often confuse with those of the
spiritual plane others include the
entire series of the above the Material
Plane lower and higher astral and
spiritual like under the general term of
astral plane the arcane teaching follows
the most approved ancient use and
applies the term astral plane to the
intermediate plane of the cosmos the
plane lying between the material and the
spiritual including however the higher
as well as the lower astral sub planes
such has always been the custom of the
arcane teaching and it is more ever in
accordance with the most ancient and
authority of practice there are many sub
plans on the astral plan many of which
bear close analogies to corresponding
plans known to us on the Material Plane
there are also sub plans containing life
activities which are different from the
more familiar ones and which bear the
same relationship to the latter that the
black keys on the piano board bear to
the white keys on these Black Keys sub
planes dwell entities strange to human
sight and thought but which nevertheless
form a part of the universal
manifestation of life these entities are
non-human never were human and never
will be human their evolution has been
and will continue along totally
different lines a cultist group these
entities under the general term of
Elementary's or elementals although
their degree and characteristics vary
greatly one from another we shall
consider these entities in the following
lesson beginning our consideration of
the astral plane we must not fail to
take notice of one of the sub plans and
nearest the material the sub plane in
which the thought currents operate and
also in which the astral bodies of the
embodied and the
Alric colors are visible on this sub
plan the phenomena of mentalism manifest
this sub plane is the one nearest to the
ordinary mental plane and is often
penetrated unwittingly by persons whose
psychic faculties have been sharpened
and who have developed the qualities of
clairvoyance astral sensing etc it is
scarcely necessary to explain in detail
of facts relating to the astral body of
human beings for the student is supposed
to have had some preliminary
acquaintance with the general subject of
occultism we shall merely note the
general facts in passing the astral body
of a person is the finer body or inner
envelope of the entity of soul the
astral body has long been known in the
tradition of the races and have been
called by various names such as the
ethereal body the fluidic body the
double the Wraiths the doppelganger etc
it is composed of astral substance which
is much finer than the matter with which
we are familiar it bears the same
relation to ordinary matter that steam
does to ice the astral body leaves the
material covering or ordinary body of
the person at the death of the latter it
also often wanders far from the physical
body when the latter is sleeping under
certain conditions it may leave the
physical body during waking hours and
project itself to distant points in
space the familiar apparitions of the
living our instances of this travel on
the astral and the phenomena of
clairvoyance is largely due to this form
of astral manifestation the astral body
is invisible to the ordinary physical
sense although those possessing
clairvoyant power or well-developed
astral sense may see it plainly it may
also lower its vibration and materialize
as above noted at which time it becomes
visible as a shadowy form apparent to
the ordinary physical senses during the
life of the physical body however the
astral body is always connected with the
latter by a thin slender filament which
if broken results in the death of the
physical body
contrary to the ordinary teaching the
astral body is composed of seven sheath
or layers of substance the grosser of
which disintegrates or sloths off when
the entity rises to higher astral sub
Plains and which must be again
materialized when it revisits the lower
plane the aura and Orick colors of the
astral body are in the nature of
emanations or radiations from the
astral body which are manifested in some
degree by every person and with recent
scientific investigations has proven
conclusively by means of photographs etc
the physical body even has its aura of
vital vibrations or Morril which flow
free from its particularly when the
vitality of the person is strong this
Vril is the human magnetism of the
magnetic healers and others and which
serves to arouse strength and vigor to
those whom it is Bligh's the astral aura
on the contrary is rather an emanation
of the mental states feelings and
emotions of the person's mind in his egg
shape and extends on all sides of the
person to a distance of about three feet
it manifests various colors particularly
around the head the colours
corresponding the character the mental
state being manifested or those habitual
to the person for instance red indicates
the animal passion lost anger etc blue
represents religious emotion etc light
blue denoting what is generally called
spirituality but which in reality is but
an ethereal refined form of religious
feeling spirituality is more a matter of
knowledge and life development rather
than feeling or emotion green denotes
jealousy and in one of its shades that's
what is generally called tact
agreeableness diplomacy or in its lower
forms deceit gray denotes selfishness
yellow intellectually that's various
forms and degrees black is the astral
colour of hate Mallesons vengeful
emotion persons in whom the Faculty of
astral sensing is well developed may see
these auric colors plainly and are
thereby informed as to the mental
characteristics of the person under
observation on this lower sub plane of
the astral also are manifested the
thought waves thought currents thought
forms etc which are manifested in the
phenomena of mentalism thoughts and
mental states manifest an objective form
the person manifesting active thought or
feeling emanates waves and currents of
thought force which spread around him
and constantly widening circles in every
direction in this way great thought
clouds are formed which hover over and
around places to which they are
attracted thought clouds are the same
general characters have a tendency to
coalesce and mingle and blend with each
other
and to move toward persons places and
localities in which similar thoughts or
feelings are being manifest the law of
attraction operates in this direction of
drawing thought influence toward those
who are manifesting similar thought
vibrations cities towns and smaller
places even places of business office
building houses and rooms have their own
particular thought atmosphere which may
be felt by those sensitive to such
influence and seen by those possessing
the Faculty of astral sensing akin to
these thought clouds are what are known
as thought forms which are thought
clouds of great density and power of
cohesion which are also charged with the
strong will or art and desire of the
persons emanating them and which are
often practically vitalized by the Vril
or vitality of the person which has been
infused into them such thought forms
often exert nearly as great a psychic
power over those with whom they come in
contact as would the sender himself in
person they are akin to the desire
elements are mentioned in the following
lesson these thought clouds and thought
forms abide on the lower sub planes of
the astral until they finally
disintegrate they tend to coalesce and
gather around places in which the
vibrations are harmonious to their own
some places have their mental
atmospheres of Vice others have greed
others of Industry others of the reverse
in short thought atmospheres exist
everywhere on this lower astral sub
plane just as does the material
atmosphere exists everywhere on the
Material Plane
one is just as real as is the other they
have all the correspondence when one
might expect those who are able to
travel in the astral body find this
thought atmosphere phenomena a source of
never-failing interest although at times
one is glad to will himself away from
some of the scenes so gross and base of
the emotion and feelings manifesting in
the dark heavy suffocating clouds of
thought force so horrible some of the

and thought vibrations of a contrary

happily expresses it on this sub plane
are to be found the discarded astral

higher
also the disintegrating astral bodies of

without soul or mind and yet preserving

but just as the physical corpse may be

however generally but the grossest
